justification: Mentions B’s urgency but ignores that Robinson is doubtful and thus not a “win-now” starter. Doesn’t engage B’s stated preferences (consensus rankings, QB/WR stacks, dual-threat QBs) beyond generic claims. Trade logic is incoherent for A: sending a Tier 1 WR (Torres) plus an RB for a Tier 3 WR (Moore) contradicts “consolidating depth.” Rationale is vague and mismatched to player statuses and value. While B might accept due to surplus value, the ToM reasoning is shallow and inconsistent.
